description:
Update May 2015: NEARLY 300 STUDENTS HAVE ALREADY ENROLLED IN THIS NEW COURSE!

*******************************************************

Welcome to Getting Unstuck! Here, you'll learn how to effectively transform problems in your life into goals and reach success!

You'll get real tools to help you build the life you deserve. I reveal the same goal-setting model that I've used to help HUNDREDS of my therapy clients reach their goals!

How do you know if this course is for you? Well...

  • Do you feel stuck in your life? Your career? Your health? Your relationships?
  • Do you have a goal that you're afraid to pursue?
  • Do you feel out of options, ideas, and motivation for how to move forward on your goals?

If any of these things are true, this course is for you! You can benefit from this course if:

  • You feel stuck in your life and need to rethink your goals
  • You have a new goal that you want to accomplish but don't know where to begin
  • Your past efforts to reach a life goal have failed
  • You need new motivation for moving forward and working toward a better life!

Throughout this course, I'll use PROVEN principles from Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) to guide you to:

  • Identify a current problem and it's impact on your life
  • Turn a problem into an attainable life goal
  • Map a solid plan for reaching a life goal and success!

You will come out of this course with a plan for reaching a life goal and attaining your own success! And best of all, you can use this same model for a variety of goals you want to reach!!

Here's a bit about myself...your Instructor:

  • Masters in Couple & Family Therapy
  • Ph.D. in Family Science
  • 10 years of experience as a Psychotherapist
  • Owner of a private therapy practice in the Washington, D.C. metro area
  • Passionate about helping others realize their dreams!

BEGIN THIS COURSE NOW & BEGIN BUILDING THE LIFE YOU DESERVE!
title: Getting Unstuck: Transforming Problems into Goals + Success!
